welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Famy, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city known for its lush nature, warm hospitality, and rich culture. Explore and enjoy all that Famy has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving most international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively used by Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest and most advanced terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small and basic terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, primarily used by budget airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.
